instructions.sl.utf8: Pazljivo preberite vsako izjavo. Če se z izjavo strinjate, obkljukajte ustrezno polje.
instructions.en.utf8: Read each statement carefully. If you agree with the statement, than tick the appropriate checkbox.

question.sl.utf8: V časopisnih člankih razumem osebne podatke (kraj prebivališča, starost ipd.)
question.en.utf8: I can understand information about people (where they live, age, etc.) in newspapers.

question.sl.utf8: Na podlagi plakatov za prireditve se lahko odločim za ogled koncerta ali filma in razberem, kje in kdaj se bo prireditev dogajala.
question.en.utf8: I can locate a concert or a film on calendars of public events or posters and identify where it takes place and at what time it starts.

question.sl.utf8: Prebrani vprašalnik (npr. na carini ali pri prijavi prenočišča v hotelu) toliko razumem, da lahko vpišem svoje osebne podatke (npr. ime, priimek, datum rojstva, narodnost).
question.en.utf8: I can understand a survey (entry permit form, hotel registration form) well enough to give the most important information about myself (name, surname, date of birth, nationality).

question.sl.utf8: Razumem besede in izraze na znakih, ki jih srečujem v vsakdanjem življenju (npr. »železniška postaja«, »parkirišče«, »kaditi prepovedano«, »ostani na desnem pasu«).
question.en.utf8: I can understand words and phrases on signs encountered in everyday life (for instance »station«, »car park«, »no parking«, »no smoking«).

question.sl.utf8: Razumem najpomembnejše računalniške ukaze (npr. »natisni«, »shrani«, »kopiraj«, itd.).
question.en.utf8: I can understand the most important orders in a computer programme such as »Print«, »Save«, »Copy«, etc.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem kratko, enostavno pisno razlago (npr. »levo«, »desno«, »naprej«, »nazaj«).
question.en.utf8: I can understand simple directions (»left«, »right«, »forward«, »back«).

question.sl.utf8: Razumem kratka sporočila na razglednicah (npr. pozdrave s počitnic).
question.en.utf8: I can understand short simple messages on postcards, for example, holiday greetings.

question.sl.utf8: V vsakdanjem življenju znam prebrati enostavnejša pisna sporočila svojih znancev in sošolcev (npr. »Vrnem se ob 16.00«).
question.en.utf8: In everyday situations I can understand simple messages written by friends or colleagues, for example, »Back at 4 o'clock«.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem enostavne besede in stavke na oglasnih deskah, reklamnih tablah, v katalogih in brošurah.
question.en.utf8: I can understand simple words and sentences on notice boards, advertising boards, in catalogues and brochures.

question.sl.utf8: Iz sporočil ali enostavnih časopisnih člankov, ki vsebujejo predvsem števila, imena, slike in napise lahko razberem pomembne informacije.
question.en.utf8: I can identify important information in messages or simple newspaper articles in which numbers and names play an important role and which are clearly structured and illustrated.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem enostavno osebno pismo, v katerem mi kdo piše o stvareh iz vsakdanjega življenja ali me o tem sprašuje.
question.en.utf8: I can understand a simple personal letter in which the writer tells or asks me about aspects of everyday life.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem enostavna pisna sporočila svojih znancev in sošolcev (npr. kdaj se srečamo, da bi igrali nogomet) ali obvestilo, da moram priti predčasno v šolo.
question.en.utf8: I can understand simple written messages from friends or class-mates, for example, saying when we should meet to play football or asking me to be at school early.

question.sl.utf8: Z letakov o dejavnostih v prostem času, o razstavah ipd. lahko razberem najpomembnejše podatke.
question.en.utf8: I can find the most important information on leisure time activities, exhibitions, etc. in information leaflets.

question.sl.utf8: V časopisu lahko preletim male oglase, najdem iskano rubriko in poiščem najpomembnejše informacije (npr. o značilnostih, ceni in velikosti stanovanja, avta, računalnika ipd.).
question.en.utf8: I can skim small advertisements in newspapers; locate the heading or column I want and identify the most important pieces if information (for example about characteristics, price and largeness of an apartment, car, computer, etc.)

question.sl.utf8: Razumem kratke zgodbe o vsakdanjih stvareh in znanih temah, če so napisane v enostavnem jeziku.
question.en.utf8: I can understand short narratives about everyday things dealing with topics which are familiar to me if the text is written in simple language.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem bistveno vsebino časopisnega članka z aktualno in poznano temo.
question.en.utf8: I can understand the main points in short newspaper articles about current and familiar topics.

question.sl.utf8: V časopisih in revijah razumem večino komentarjev in intervjujev, v katerih ljudje izrazijo osebno stališče glede aktualnih tem ali dogodkov.
question.en.utf8: I can read columns or interviews in newspapers and magazines in which someone presents an opinion on a current topic or event and understand the overall meaning of the text.

question.sl.utf8: Iz sobesedila lahko razberem nekatere neznane besede, ki mi omogočajo slediti bistvu napisanega.
question.en.utf8: I can guess the meaning of single unknown words from the context, thus deducing the meaning of expressions if the topic is familiar.

question.sl.utf8: Hitro lahko preletim kratka besedila (npr. kratka sporočila) in najdem dejstva in pomembne informacije (npr. kaj je kdo počel in kje).
question.en.utf8: I can skim short texts (for example, short messages) and find relevant facts and information (for example, who has done what and where).

question.sl.utf8: Razumem najpomembnejše informacije v kratkih in enostavnih brošurah iz vsakdanjega življenja.
question.en.utf8: I can understand the most important information in short simple everyday information brochures.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem enostavna sporočila in standardna pisma iz podjetij, društev in javnih ustanov.
question.en.utf8: I can extract relevant information from short official texts meant for the public (for example, school rules or public regulations).

question.sl.utf8: V zasebnem pismu razumem opise dogodkov, čustev in želja v tolikšni meri, da si lahko z nekom zasebno dopisujem.
question.en.utf8: In private letters I can understand those parts dealing with events, feelings and wishes well enough to correspond regularly with a pen-friend.

question.sl.utf8: Lahko sledim poteku zgodbe, če je dobro razčlenjena, ter v njej prepoznavam najpomembnejše dogodke in ocenim, kako pomembni so.
question.en.utf8: I can understand the plot of a clearly structured story and recognise what the most important episodes and events are and what is significant about them.

question.sl.utf8: Hitro dojamem vsebino in pomembnost novic, člankov in poročil o temah, ki me zanimajo ali so povezane z mojim izobraževanjem, in se odločim, ali so vredni temeljitega branja.
question.en.utf8: I can rapidly grasp the content and the significance of news, articles and reports on topics connected with my interests or my job and decide if a closer reading is worthwhile.

question.sl.utf8: Lahko berem in razumem članke in poročila o aktualnih vprašanjih, v katerih avtorji zastopajo določeno stališče in mnenje.
question.en.utf8: I can read and understand articles and reports on current issues in which the writers express specific attitudes and points of view.

question.sl.utf8: Podrobno razumem besedila s tematiko, ki me zanima ali je povezana s področjem mojega izobraževanja.
question.en.utf8: I can understand in detail texts within my field of interest or the area of my education.

question.sl.utf8: Berem in razumem tudi strokovne članke, ki se ne nanašajo na moje izobraževalno področje, če za kontrolo občasno uporabljam slovar.
question.en.utf8: I can understand specialised articles outside my own field if I can occasionally check in a dictionary.

question.sl.utf8: Berem kritike, ki se nanašajo na vsebino in oceno kulturnih dogodkov (filmi, gledališče, knjige, koncerti), in povzemam bistvo.
question.en.utf8: I can read reviews dealing with the content and criticism of cultural topics (films, theatre, books, concerts) and summarise the main points.

question.sl.utf8: Berem dopise o tematiki znotraj svojega izobraževalnega ali interesnega področja in povzemam bistvene točke.
question.en.utf8: I can read letters on topics within my areas of academic or professional specialisation or interest and grasp the most important points.

question.sl.utf8: Hitro lahko preletim priročnik (npr. o računalniškem programu) ter za določen problem najdem ustrezno razlago in pomoč.
question.en.utf8: I can quickly look through a manual (for example, for a computer program) and find and understand the relevant explanations and help for a specific problem.

question.sl.utf8: V romanu ali dramskem delu prepoznam motive književnih oseb za njihova dejanja in razumem posledice njihovih odločitev.
question.en.utf8: I can understand in a narrative or play the motives for the characters' actions and their consequences for the development of the plot.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem tudi zahtevnejša in daljša besedila ter jih znam ustno ali/in pisno povzeti.
question.en.utf8: I can understand fairly long demanding texts and summarise them orally or in written form.

question.sl.utf8: Lahko berem poglobljena poročila ter poglobljene analize in komentarje, v katerih so podana razmerja, mnenja in stališča.
question.en.utf8: I can read complex reports, analyses and commentaries where opinions, viewpoints and connections are discussed.

question.sl.utf8: Iz visoko specializiranih besedil s svojega interesnega področja (npr. iz poročil o raziskavah) znam povzeti informacije, ideje, stališča.
question.en.utf8: I can extract information, ideas and opinions from highly specialised texts in my own field, for example, research reports.

question.sl.utf8: Če imam dovolj časa za branje, razumem tudi zahtevnejša navodila (npr. o uporabi nove naprave), čeprav niso povezana s področjem, ki me zanima.
question.en.utf8: I can understand fairly long complex directions and instructions, for example, for the use of a new piece of equipment, even if these are not related to my job or field of interest, provided I have enough time to reread them.

question.sl.utf8: Z občasno uporabo slovarja razumem vsakovrstno korespondenco.
question.en.utf8: I can read any correspondence with the occasional use of a dictionary.

question.sl.utf8: Tekoče berem sodobna literarna besedila.
question.en.utf8: I can read contemporary literary texts with ease.

question.sl.utf8: Na podlagi literarnega besedila znam oblikovati stališča, v besedilu pa razumem tudi sporočila, ki niso dobesedno napisana, ter razmerja med deli besedila.
question.en.utf8: I can go beyond the concrete plot of a narrative and grasp implicit meanings, ideas and connections.

question.sl.utf8: Tudi pri zahtevnejših besedilih znam ugotoviti nasprotja, vsebinska neskladja in nelogične utemeljitve.
question.en.utf8: I can recognise the social, political or historical background and possible inconsistencies of a literary work.

question.sl.utf8: V besedilu prepoznam besedne igre, tudi če je pomen drugačen od dobesedno zapisanega (npr. ironija, satira).
question.en.utf8: I can recognise plays on words and appreciate texts whose real meaning is not explicit (for example, irony, satire).

question.sl.utf8: Razumem besedilo, ki je pogovorno obarvano in vsebuje veliko idiomatskih zvez in slengovskih besed.
question.en.utf8: I can understand texts written in a very colloquial style and containing many idiomatic expressions or slang.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem priročnike, uredbe in pogodbe, tudi če ne sodijo na področje, za katero se zanimam.
question.en.utf8: I can understand manuals, regulations and contracts even within unfamiliar fields.

question.sl.utf8: Lahko berem sodobna in klasična literarna dela različnih zvrsti (poezijo, prozo, dramska besedila).
question.en.utf8: I can understand contemporary and classical literary texts of different genres (poetry, prose, drama).

question.sl.utf8: Lahko berem besedila, kot so literarne kolumne ali satirični komentarji, v katerih je veliko povedanega posredno in ima besedilo dvojni pomen, in lahko razvozlam skriti pomen besedila.
question.en.utf8: I can read texts such as literary columns or satirical glosses where much is said in an indirect and ambiguous way and which contain hidden value judgements.

question.sl.utf8: Prepoznam različne stilne značilnosti (besedne igre, metafore, literarne motive, simboliko, dvoumnosti in konotacije besed) in razumem njihovo vlogo v besedilu.
question.en.utf8: I can recognise different stylistic means (puns, metaphors, symbols, connotations, ambiguity) and appreciate and evaluate their function within the text.
